document.full_text: canada's patrick chan recorded the highest ever score to win the men's short program at the world figure skating championships on wednesday and take a giant step toward his first global title.
document.title: figure skating-canada's chan dazzles with record score
lines_and_colors: canada's patrick chan recorded the highest ever score to win the men's short program at the world figure skating championships on wednesday and take a giant step toward his first global title.
